amendment.description: To provide safety and security with respect to aviation repair stations.

action.text: The committee substitute as amended agreed to by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 905 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 905 proposed by Senator Specter. (consideration: CR S7806-7807, S7820; text: CR S7806-7807) To provide safety and security with respect to aviation repair stations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 905 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment agreed to: The committee substitute as amended agreed to by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 905 proposed by Senator Specter.
